data.text: I muli nia mee aanei, gei au gaa mmada gi tuai dangada di langi e haneia i di langi. Mee dono mogobuna damana, gei di madamada o maa gu haga maahina henuailala hagatau.

Mee gaa wolo gi nua, “Mee gu mooho! Babylon damana lagu mooho! Gei dolomeenei, mee guu hai di gowaa e noho ai nia balu god mo nia hagataalunga gulugulua, nia hagadilinga manu mamaangi gulugulua ge haga ginagina dangada.18.2 Isaiah 13.21; 21.9; Jeremiah 50.39; 51.8; Hagagida 14.8

Nia henua huogodoo gu inu nia waini o maa, go nia waini maaloo o ana haihai huaidu. Nia king o henuailala guu hai di hai be di manu i baahi o mee, gei digau huihui mee o henuailala gu maluagina mai dono hagagailaa hiihai.”18.3 Isaiah 23.17; Jeremiah 51.7
Gei au ga longono tuai lee mai di langi, e helekai,
Idimaa, nia hala o maa gu logo
Heia gi mee be dana hai
Wanga ina dono hagaduadua
Ma dela guu hai beenei,
Nia king o henuailala ala nogo dau gi ana haihai huaidu mo ana hiihai huaidu, la ga tangi wawwawe i di nadau gidee di huiahi o di ulaula dela e dudu a mee.18.9 Ezekiel 26.16-17
Digaula e tuu mai hagamogowaa, idimaa, digaula e mmaadagu di dau ang gi nia hagaduadua o maa. Digaula ga helekai,
Digau huihui mee o henuailala le e tangi wawe labelaa mo di lodo huaidu i mee, idimaa, ma gu hagalee digau e hui nadau goloo aanei ai:18.11 Ezekiel 27.31,36

nia goolo, silber, hadu hagalabagau, hadu lodo baehua, nia gahu ne hai gi nia gahu lenge madammaa, gahu gono mmee halatee, gahu ‘silk’, gahu gono mmee malama, nia hagadilinga laagau kida ngadaa, nia hagadilinga mee ne hai gi nia madaagoo manu, mono laagau hui ngadaa, baalanga mmee, baalanga ‘iron’, mono hadu hamaaloo,18.12 Ezekiel 27.12,13,22

mo nia mee haga kala meegai ‘cinnamon’, ‘spice’, nia mee haga kala ‘incense’, ‘myrrh’ mo nia ‘frankincense’, nia waini, mono lolo olib, palaawaa mo nia palaawaa ‘wheat’, kau mo nia siibi, hoodo mo nia kulumaa, nia hege mo nia mouli o nia daangada.

Digau huihui mee ga helekai gi mee, “Nia goloo huogodoo ala nogo hiihai ginai goe bolo e hai au mee la gu hagalee, o maluagina mo o goloo madamada huogodoo gu hagalee, gei goe e deemee di gidee labelaa nia maa!”

Digau huihui mee ne maluagina i nadau huihui mee i lodo di waahale deelaa gaa tuu hagamogowaa i mee, idimaa, digaula e mmaadagu di dau gi nia hagaduadua o maa. Digaula ga tangitangi mo lodo huaidu,18.15 Ezekiel 27.31,36
ga helekai,
Gei i lodo hua di aawaa e dahi,
gaa tangi i di nadau mmada gi di huiahi mai di ulaula dela e dudu a mee, ga helekai, “Deai di waahale be di waahale damana beenei ai!”18.18 Ezekiel 27.32
Digaula gaa kili nadau gelegele dogolia gi hongo nadau libogo, gaa tangi mo di lodo huaidu, ga helekai,

Di langi la gi tenetene gi di mooho o maa. Goodou go nia daangada a God, mo digau agoago hagau, mo nia soukohp, goodou la gi tenetene. Idimaa, God gu hagahuaidu a mee e hui dana hai dela ne hai adu gi goodou!18.20 Deuteronomy 32.43; Jeremiah 51.48

Tangada di langi maaloo ga dahi aga dana hadu damana gadoo be di hadu olo palaawaa, gaa hudu gi lodo di moana, ga helekai, “Deenei di hai e hudu gi daha di waahale aamua go Babylon, ga deemee di mmada ginai tangada labelaa.18.21 Jeremiah 51.63-64; Ezekiel 26.21

Nia daahili ala e huwa gi di ‘harp’ mo nia lee dangada, digau ala e hai hegau gi nia ‘flute’, mo nia buu ‘trumpet’ ga dee longono! Digau ngalua o nia moomee huogodoo ga hagalee, di lee o di hadu olo palaawaa ga hagalee longono mai do baahi!18.22 Ezekiel 26.13; Isaiah 24.8Di ‘flute’

Di maahina o di malama ga hagalee. Nia lee o nia daane mo nia ahina hai lodo la ga hagalee longono mai i do baahi. Au gau huihui mee la nogo kaedahi e maaloo nadau moomee i henuailala hagatau, gei goe gu halahalau digau henuailala gi au buubuu dilikai!”18.23 Jeremiah 7.34; 25.10

Babylon la ne hagaduadua, idimaa, nia dodo o nia soukohp mo nia daangada a God la guu kida i lodo di waahale deelaa, go nia dodo o digau huogodoo ala ne daaligi gii mmade i henuailala.18.24 Jeremiah 51.49
